title: Social Domain Microlearning Design for Integrated Text-Image Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to analyze basic social phenomena and digital literacy
context.additional_context: A learning environment integrating visual materials to enhance problem-solving capabilities for current professionals addressing social issues

learning_goals: Learners can explain causal relationships of social phenomena with 80% accuracy by integrating analysis of diverse external representations (text-images)
Learners can efficiently process complex social data with over 70% effectiveness by applying metacognitive strategies based on the ITPC model
Learners can perform field-oriented social problem-solving projects with a 90% completion rate using visual materials provided in a digital environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
